name: Gluttonous Greedfish
text: You can target 1 Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua monster in your GY with a Level less than or equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand; Special Summon it, but it cannot activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Gluttonous Greedfish" once per turn. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can have the Synchro Monster that used this card as material gain 200 ATK/DEF for each card in your opponent's hand.
